data.convo: Hello ? Is that Mark ? How are you ? I haven't heard from you in ages . I've been overseas , So have you been busy lately ? Pretty busy.So are you back for good ? Yes , I was just wondering when you'd have time to go fishing . Well , I'm not working on the weekend , so we could grab some beer , ice and our fishing rods , and head out to the river . That sounds good . I've missed you my friend . Same here .
